intro.title: Gajeren Zagaye
intro.desc: Bari mu bi manyan fasaloli. Za mu haskaka kowane iko kuma mu jira ka gwada shi. Za ka iya tsallakewa a kowane lokaci.

language.title: Zaɓi Harshe
language.desc: Buɗe wannan jerin ka zaɓi harshen da kake so.

mode.title: Canja Yanayi
mode.desc: Danna maballin jigo don sauyawa tsakanin haske/duhu.

upload.title: Loda Hoto
upload.desc: Danna ko ja hoto anan don cire launukansa.

slider.title: Daidaita Yawan Launuka
slider.desc: Motsi mai ja don canza yawan launukan da za a cire.

export.title: Sauke Paleti
export.desc: Danna JSON don sauke fayil ɗin palet ɗinku.

copy.title: Kwafi Duk Launuka
copy.desc: Kwafi duk launuka zuwa allo mai ɗaurewa da dannawa guda.

finish.title: An Kammala!
finish.desc: Kun koyi abubuwan asali. Ji daɗin ƙirƙirar palet!

app.title: Mai Haɓaka Paleti
app.description: Haɓaka kyawawan jerin launuka daga hotunanka

upload.title: Loda Hoto
upload.dropzone: Jefar da hotonka a nan ko danna don bincika
upload.supports: Yana goyan bayan: JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP

colors.position: Wannan launi yana da matsayi a cikin hoton

actions.copyDesc: An kwafi {format} zuwa allo mai makala
actions.copyAllDesc: Dukkan launuka an kwafi zuwa allo mai makala

notifications.extractError: An kasa cire launuka daga hoton

empty.title: Babu Hoto Yanzu
empty.description: Loda hoto don fara haɓaka palet ɗin launuka

footer.disclaimer: Wannan shafin yana amfani da karamin shirin "colorthief" don cire launuka daga hotunan da kuka zaba. Ana sarrafa hotunan a cikin burauzarku na gida; ba ma ɗora, adanawa ko raba hotunanku. Aikin sarrafawa ba a bayyana shi ba kuma hotuna ba a adana su.
